TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RC2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RC2 Inherits SymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示基底類別， 演算法的所有實作 (Implementation) 必須從它衍生。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 有先進加密標準 (Advanced Encryption Standard，AES) 這個較新的對稱加密演算法可供使用。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 請考慮使用演算法和其衍生的類別，而不是類別。Consider using the algorithm and its derived classes instead of the class. 使用只為了與舊版的應用程式和資料的相容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 應用程式程式碼會建立衍生類別的新執行個體。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 此演算法支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 1024 位元為增量單位的 8 位元，但實作只支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 128 位元以 8 位元為增量單位。This algorithm supports key lengths from 40 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 8 bits, but the implementation only supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits. 這個方法會初始化的受保護的欄位為下表所列的預設值。This method initializes the protected fields of to the default values listed in the following table. |欄位Field|預設值Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| ||128128| ||6464| ||6464|

summary.span: 建立密碼編譯物件的執行個體，以執行 演算法。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RC2 Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As RC2

summary.span: 建立密碼編譯物件的執行個體，以執行 演算法。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the algorithm.

returns.span: 密碼編譯物件的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of a cryptographic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立可用來加密和解密資料 RC2 類別的執行個體使用這個方法。Use this method to create an instance of the RC2 class that you can use to encrypt and decrypt data. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立和使用 RC2 物件來加密和解密檔案中的資料。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何建立和使用 RC2 物件來加密和解密記憶體中的資料。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在已啟用美國聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 模式的情況下使用演算法，但它與 FIPS 不相容。

span.span: The algorithm was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RC2 Create(string AlgName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (AlgName As String) As RC2

param.name: AlgName
param.span: 要使用之 的特定實作的名稱。

span.span: The name of the specific implementation of to use.

summary.span: 建立密碼編譯物件的執行個體來執行 演算法的指定實作。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the algorithm.

returns.span: 密碼編譯物件的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of a cryptographic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立可用來加密和解密資料 RC2 類別的執行個體使用這個方法。Use this method to create an instance of the RC2 class that you can use to encrypt and decrypt data. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立和使用 RC2 物件來加密和解密檔案中的資料。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何建立和使用 RC2 物件來加密和解密記憶體中的資料。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

exception.span: 參數描述的演算法，在聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 模式啟用的情況下使用，但是和 FIPS 並不相容。

span.span: The algorithm described by the parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int EffectiveKeySize { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EffectiveKeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int EffectiveKeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 演算法使用之秘密金鑰的大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the effective size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

value.span: 演算法所使用的有效金鑰大小。

span.span: The effective key size used by the algorithm.
The effective key size is invalid.

summary.span: 表示 演算法使用之秘密金鑰的有效大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Represents the effective size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位透過存取屬性。This field is accessed through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 演算法使用之秘密金鑰的大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

value.span: 演算法使用之秘密金鑰的大小。

span.span: The size of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此演算法支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 1024 位元為增量單位的 8 位元，但 RC2CryptoServiceProvider 實作只支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 128 位元以 8 位元為增量單位。This algorithm supports key lengths from 40 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 8 bits, but the RC2CryptoServiceProvider implementation only supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits.

exception.span: RC2 金鑰大小的值小於有效的金鑰大小值。

span.span: The value for the RC2 key size is less than the effective key size value.
